short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple notepad that allows you to save and manage links with notes

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Note X is a powerful and intuitive note-taking app designed to help you organize your ideas, notes, and links efficiently. It offers a clean and user-friendly interface, allowing you to create multiple sections, each with its own title, notes, and URL links.

Key Features:

- Section-based Organization: Break down your notes into customizable sections, making it easy to keep different topics or projects organized.

- URL Management: Add, validate, and manage important links within each section, with easy-to-access formatting and error messages for invalid URLs.

- Dark Mode: Enjoy a comfortable reading experience with the toggleable dark mode, reducing eye strain during late-night work sessions.

- Offline Persistence: All your notes and links are saved locally, so you never lose your progress even after closing the app.

- Download Button: Export notes in a structured format for sharing or archiving.

-Add New: Quickly add new sections to maintain organized and structured notes.

- Remove Buttons: Delete sections to maintain an organized workspace.

- Plus Icon for URLs: Add multiple links under a section.

-Chevron Icon: Expand or collapse sections for better content management.

Install Note X if you’re looking for a flexible, easy-to-use tool to manage notes, research links, and projects—all while staying organized and productive!
